19525.「おや……。あの者は……。\n 我が城の 精鋭部隊の者か……。:
Well that man is one of the elite troops of my
castle.

19526.「ラグアス王子！ 一大事であります！:
Prince Raguas! This is a matter of great
importance!

19527.「エピステーサ丘陵を巡察している兵士から\n 先ほど 報告が ありました！:
A soldier patrolling the Epistesa Hills just
reported in!

19528.「ここより西 エピステーサ丘陵の東にある\n ピテッザのほら穴に\n 亡霊兵士が:
West of here, in the east of the Epistesa
Hills, a Spirit Soldier is said to have
appeared in the Pitheza Cave!

19530.「多くの亡霊兵士が城を襲う あの夢……。\n ぼくの見た夢が もしも現実になるの:
If the dream I had about the many ghost soldiers attacking the castle... if the dream I had comes true, it means that Spirit
Soldiers will continue to appear...

19531.「民に 不安を与えるわけにはいかない！\n 情報がもれないよう お前たち精鋭部隊:
We can't afford to cause unrest among the people! To prevent any information from leaking out, I need you and your elite unit to
take down the Spirit Soldiers!

19533.「精鋭部隊は いずれも\n メギストリス流剣術をマスターしている\n 実力者たち:
The elite troops are all masters of the
Megistris style of swordsmanship.

19534.「ぜひ <pc>さんのチカラも\n 貸していただきたい。:
We would like to ask for the help of
<pc> as well.

19535.「ここより西 エピステーサ丘陵の東にある\n ピテッザのほら穴へ行き 精鋭部隊と:
Would you be willing to go west of here to Pitheza Cave, east of the Epistesa Hills, and work with an elite unit to defeat the Spirit
Soldiers?

19536.「ありがとうございます！\n <pc>さんがいれば 不安はありません。\n それ:
Thank you!!! With <pc> I have no
worries. Well then, I look forward to working
with you.

19537.「ありがとうございます！\n ……ですが どうやら 頼まれごとを\n たくさん:
Thank you! I'm sorry, but it seems you have a
lot of requests.

19538.「民の安全にも 関わりますので\n <pc>さんのチカラが 必要なんですが\n:
I need the help of <pc> to make sure
the people are safe, but... well... I'm
stumped...

19539.「ほかの用事が 終わったら\n また ここに戻ってきてください。\n お待ちして:
Come back here when you've finished your other
business. We'll be waiting for you
<pc>.

19540.「うーん……。そうですか。\n <pc>さんは 頼りになるので\n 協力を お願:
Hmmm... okay. I'd like to ask for your help
with <pc>, since I know I can count
on him...

19541.「ムリに頼んでは失礼ですね。\n 気が変わったら また 来てください。\n ぼく:
It would be rude to ask you to do something you don't want to do. If you change your mind, please come again. I'll be waiting for you
here.

19542.「私たち…精鋭部隊が…敗れるとは……？\n な…なんという 強さだ……。:
We... elite troops... defeated...? What...
what strength...

19543.「あの剣さばき 私たち…と似て…いる。\n メギストリス流剣術に…………。:
His swordsmanship... is similar to ours.
Megistris' swordsmanship.

19544.「我らハ 不屈ノ闘志を持つ豪傑……。\n 我らヲ止めラレる者なド おらヌ……。:
We are great men with an indomitable fighting
spirit and there is no one who can stop us...

19545.「我ラは 戦イ抜く……。\n 愛すル家族ヲ 救いダすノダ……。:
We will fight our way through... to save the
families we love...

19546.「我ラは 戦イ抜く……。\n 愛すル家族ヲ 救いダすノダ……。:
We will fight our way through... to save the
families we love...

19548.「パルカラス王ガ フタタび\n 号令ヲ かけタ時……。\n 我らハ進軍シ 愛すル:
When King Parkaras gave the order to the Foot
soldiers we marched in to save our beloved
families.

19550.「これは ずいぶんと古い本ですね。\n 表紙に書かれている 題名を見るかぎり\n:
This is a very old book. The title on the
front cover suggests that it is not written in
modern characters...

19551.「うーむ……。これは……。\n 昔 プクランド大陸で使われていた\n 古代文字で:
Hmmm... this is... an ancient script that was
used in Pukuland Continent a long time ago.

19552.「以前 勉強していたので\n これくらいなら ぼくでも 読めますよ。\n どれど:
I can read this much because I studied it
before. I can read this.

19555.「<pc>さん！\n この本は もしかしたら フォステイルの生涯が\n 記された:
<pc>! This book could possibly be the
book that chronicles Fostail's life!

19556.「５００年前 フォステイルが\n 王国に仕官してから 王になるまでの歴史も\n:
Maybe this book will tell the history of Fostail from his service to the kingdom 500 years ago, all the way up to his becoming
king. ...

19558.「本格的に 解読するとなると\n 学者に頼まないと ダメですね……。:
I'd have to ask a scholar to do a serious
deciphering...

19559.「よし……。学者たちを呼んで\n さっそく 解読させましょう。:
Okay... let's get the scholars over here and
have them decipher it right away.

19560.「亡霊を討伐し 貴重な本まで手に入れるとは\n さすがは <pc>さんですね。\:
You are indeed <pc> to have defeated
the ghosts and even obtained the precious
book. Please take this.

19561.「これから 学者たちと協力して\n 解読を行いますので また しばらくしたら\n:
We will be working with our scholars to
decipher it, so please come back in a while.
Please come back again in a while.
